about_the_game:
Oudbiao's World is a top-down perspective third-person role-playing game, which incorporates part of the simulated management content. The story of the game is very simple. On the island, he uses his bicycle to transport goods, but he has always had a wish, that is, to buy a pickup truck after saving enough money, and then leave the island to make a career elsewhere, and The story of finally realizing a wish through various efforts of one's own.

In the game, players can choose to complete various tasks of NPCs to get paid, or harvest products through agricultural activities such as collection and planting, and sell these goods to earn income. Of course, they can also learn some crafting skills to make goods Or reselling goods in different locations can also earn income. You can slowly save these incomes to fulfill your ultimate dream, and you can also spend some money on the island to experience various entertainment items on the island.

name: Oudbiao's World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Everyone watches Oudbiao, everyone talks about Oudbiao, everyone is Oudbiao, in fact, each of us has been trying to realize our wishes in our own way in this world, and the result may not be the same. As much as you want, but I still hope that everyone's tomorrow will be better
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
